name: MarsClock
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: mars clock
des:
Mars Clock provides live calculation of Mars Sol Date and Coordinated Mars Time MTC. The calculation is based on algorithms referenced in the following documents:
Wikipedia : https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sol_(day_on_Mars)
http://jtauber.github.io/mars-clock/

Mars24: https://www.giss.nasa.gov/tools/mars24/

Formula used for calculation is MSD = (Julian Date using International Atomic Time - 2451549.5 + 0.00014)/1.02749125 + 44796.0

The skill can also provide some interesting facts about Mars.

If you found this skill useful and interesting, please give us a high rating.

You can also send feedback to cnvijayrao@gmail.com
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
